Title: L'oréal Paris Moisture Filling Shampoo 650ml
Description: Tired of dry, dull, and lifeless hair?. Now make the science of skincare a part of your hair care routine with Hyaluronic Acid. Usage – Apply on scalp and massage till lather forms.
